rows.label: tlk42300115_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Pi is fine, mo.
I'm scouting for a new star, mo.

rows.label: tlk42300115_01_msg0002
rows.name:
But it's hard to find someone as
charming as Nanakoori-san, mo.

rows.label: tlk42300115_01_msg0003
rows.name: Nanakoori-san was a true star, mo.

rows.label: tlk42300115_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Just hearing her sing a little sent shivers
down my spine, mo.

rows.label: tlk42300115_01_msg0005
rows.name:
I'm very sad that I can't hear
her sing anymore, mo.

rows.label: tlk42300115_01_msg0006
rows.name:
But it's most important for Nanakoori-san
to do what she wants to do, mo.

rows.label: tlk42300115_01_msg0007
rows.name:
Pi will always be rooting for
Nanakoori-san, mo.
